article: Last Sunday we had a great trip.My father, my mother and I  _  to summer camp.We went to a mountain.First we  arrived  at the foot of the mountain  _  bus.In the middle of the mountain there was a river.The water was clean and clear.I washed my face  _  the water.It was warm. In the mountain, there  _  flowers.They were  _  .At noon, many people got together, and they were very  _  .We made our meal in the mountain.The food was very  _  and we liked it very much. After meal, we went on our trip.We felt  _  .It was really  _  .
